name: YAML tags (Epsilon Notes compatible)
description:
After enabling this script internal QOwnNotes tag data will be lost!!!

This script makes QOwnNotes read and save note tags to YAML section before note text.
This makes tags compatible with Epsilon Notes app for Android and other apps that use YAML to store tags.
If there's no YAML section in the note the script will add one on first tag assignment.
Make sure to choose the correct option for '...' or '---' YAML ending that is supported by your app.

The YAML section must start at the first line of the note.
YAML format for tags is:
---
tags: tag1 tag2 multi_word_tag
...
